summary: This mod adds a command to most companions in the game that lets them chill out and relax instead of standing at attention all the time.
descriptionHtml:
Russian translation of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9504][b]Followers can Relax[/b][/url]
by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=2950496]KingCoin[/url]
translated by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=241997]Shadowmann[/url]

This mod adds a command to most companions in the game that lets them chill out and relax instead of standing at attention all the time.

To do this, just talk to your companion and choose the topic \"We\'ll stay here for a while.\" They will start interacting with the environment (eat, drink, sit, ect). To get them to start following you again, just talk to them and say \"Let\'s go.\"

For more info, read readme included (or readme, uloaded to database), read comments and ask your questions in discussion. (Press \"View as a .txt\" in Readme section to read it in russian).

All credits to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=2950496][b]KingCoin[/b][/url]

Recommended to use with this [url=http://modgames.net/load/247-1-0-10650]Extensible Follower Framework (RUS)[/url] (modgames)
author: KingCoin Shadowmann
